title: Patch Notes
body:
Just reading notes while i wait for update.

I think it needs proof reading before it gets released. Every patch note always has something wrong with it :)
this patch note is the spelling error in "starting"

> **CLUMSY:** Monsters no longer push away wards in their path outside of their stating position

replies.body:
Ikr they need to get their shit together! These patch notes had a major grammar error:

they accidentally wrote 'Buffed' next to Riven's name...

like seriously go back to school and learn to construct sentences properly...
haha silly Europeans, that doesn't work
